languages.text: "Я даже не буду спрашивать, пытались ли вы отправить запрос в Администратум на выделение дополнительного продовольствия. Знаю, что этого нет в вашей должностной инструкции, и вижу, что вам плевать на эти, как вы сказали, "излишки".

"I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."
languages.original_text: "Я даже не буду спрашивать, пытались ли вы отправить запрос в Администратум на выделение дополнительного продовольствия. Знаю, что этого нет в вашей должностной инструкции, и вижу, что вам плевать на эти, как вы сказали, "излишки".

traits.locale_text: "I won't even ask if you tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your job description, and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus', as you have put it".

"I won't even ask if you tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your job description, and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus', as you have put it".

"I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

"I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

languages.text: «No me molestaré siquiera en preguntar si ha intentado solicitar provisiones adicionales al Administratum. Sé que no forma parte de sus instrucciones y veo que este "excedente humano", como lo llama, no le importa lo más mínimo».
languages.original_text: "I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: «No me molestaré siquiera en preguntar si ha intentado solicitar provisiones adicionales al Administratum. Sé que no forma parte de sus instrucciones y veo que este "excedente humano", como lo llama, no le importa lo más mínimo».

languages.text: “看来，我根本不用问你有没有向内政部申请发放额外补给。看得出来，你收到的命令不包括这些内容，而且你也根本不关心这些所谓的‘过剩人口’。”
languages.original_text: "I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: “看来，我根本不用问你有没有向内政部申请发放额外补给。看得出来，你收到的命令不包括这些内容，而且你也根本不关心这些所谓的‘过剩人口’。”

languages.text: 「お前が行政局に追加の食料を嘆願したかどうかを尋ねるつもりはない。お前の説明でそんなつもりがないことはわかっているし、お前が言うところの『人口増加』について気にもとめていないことが分かっている」
languages.original_text: "I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が行政局に追加の食料を嘆願したかどうかを尋ねるつもりはない。お前の説明でそんなつもりがないことはわかっているし、お前が言うところの『人口増加』について気にもとめていないことが分かっている」

languages.text: « Je ne prendrai même pas la peine de vous demander si vous avez tenté d'en appeler à l'Administratum pour obtenir des provisions supplémentaires. Je sais que ça ne fait pas partie de vos instructions et je vois bien que vous vous fichez éperdument de ce "surplus humain", pour reprendre votre propre expression. »
languages.original_text: "I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne prendrai même pas la peine de vous demander si vous avez tenté d'en appeler à l'Administratum pour obtenir des provisions supplémentaires. Je sais que ça ne fait pas partie de vos instructions et je vois bien que vous vous fichez éperdument de ce "surplus humain", pour reprendre votre propre expression. »

languages.text: "Administratum'dan ek erzak istemeyi denedin mi diye sormayacağım bile... Bunun talimatlarında olmadığını biliyorum. Ayrıca 'insan fazlalığı' dediğin güruh, pek umurunda değil gibi."
languages.original_text: "I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: "Administratum'dan ek erzak istemeyi denedin mi diye sormayacağım bile... Bunun talimatlarında olmadığını biliyorum. Ayrıca 'insan fazlalığı' dediğin güruh, pek umurunda değil gibi."

languages.text: "Ich frage gar nicht erst, ob Ihr das Administratum um zusätzliche Rationen gebeten habt. Ich weiß, das steht nicht in Euren Anweisungen, und ich sehe, dass Euch dieser 'menschliche Überschuss', wie Ihr sagt, nicht interessiert."
languages.original_text: "I won't even ask if you have tried to petition the Administratum for additional provisions. I know it is not in your instructions and I can see that you do not care about this 'human surplus,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich frage gar nicht erst, ob Ihr das Administratum um zusätzliche Rationen gebeten habt. Ich weiß, das steht nicht in Euren Anweisungen, und ich sehe, dass Euch dieser 'menschliche Überschuss', wie Ihr sagt, nicht interessiert."
